name: Unauthorised in session endpoints

testSteps.description: Example: {ApiVersion=v1.1, Token=CONFIGURED_TOKEN, ForbiddenStatusCode=403, ResponseParam=errors[0].message, ForbiddenErrorMessage=Your credentials do not allow access to this resource}

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
When a "<ApiVersion>" request to get home timeline is done with token "<Token>"
Then status code is <ForbiddenStatusCode>
And response body contains param "<ResponseParam>" with value "<ForbiddenErrorMessage>"
